EmailTemplate.description: Notifies RS customer that funds have been disbursed
EmailTemplate.name: DOER Customer - ACH 65%
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Disbursal__c.Loan__c}'s Solar Loan funds have been disbursed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Disbursal__c.Loan__c},
BlueWave has disbursed {!Disbursal__c.Amount__c} to {!Disbursal__c.Partner__c} for your Solar Loan. This concludes the disbursements we will give to your installer.
If you have any questions, do not hesitate to email us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com or by visiting the Support Page on our website.
Sincerely, BlueWave Customer Care customercare@bluewavesolar.com (844) 786 - 4100
